name: Trials of Unstable Recollection [DEMO]
description:
What you are...
-changes everything.

Trials of Unstable Recollection is a Visual Novel filled with panic, murder and... lots of endings. 

You play as MC, who lost their memories due to an unknown cause. You ask questions about your whereabouts and your identity, which remains unsolved. Waking up inside an enormous mansion, you attempt to interact with others. You hope to get your memories back and see the truth, once and for all.

But everything is not what it seems.


Key Points:
  • Character trait selection

They say your actions matter more than your words. This time, it's your traits. Choose wisely.

  • Greyscale + Pixelated Visuals

Grey, boring backgrounds and pixels to cover up the body intrigue the readers.

  • 40 Endings (Approximately)
  • Point and Click interactions
WARNING:

This game contains blood, profanity, jumpscares, suicide, death and pixelated dead bodies and gore/body horror. Play at your own risk.

Note: This demo does not include:

- Jumpscares

- Suicide

Estimated time:

Around 20-30 minutes, depending on whether or not you would do all of the routes + traits.

NOTICE:

The full game consists of 4-5 days, each with extremely terrifying (and heartbreaking) truths. If you like this game, make sure to recommend it to your friends! It will support us a lot.

We don't accept donations! Just giving us a five-star rating is good enough. :)
